alert.note: Alert for Upper Treasure Valley (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 23 at 2:07PM MST until November 24 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 2 inches. Winds gusting as high as 25 mph. * WHERE...Upper Treasure Valley zone east of Mountain Home. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Use caution and give plenty of extra time if traveling on the I-84 corridor east of Mountain Home during the Thanksgiving holiday. For additional safety information, please visit www.weather.gov/safety/winter.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
